mean_cn: vt. 宣布放弃，与...断绝关系；  n. 垫牌
mean_en: to state publicly that you no longer have a particular belief or that you will no longer behave in a particular way
sentence: He has renounced his former associate for his crime.
sentence_trans: 因为合作伙伴犯罪，他宣布与其断绝关系。
word_etyma: re反 + nounce讲话，说出 → 反过来说 → 否认
